amendatorysection.catchline: Water Funding Task Force; funding; Department of Natural Resources; duties.
amendatorysection.para: The Department of Natural Resources shall establish a separate budget subprogram to account for funds appropriated to carry out sections 50-504 to 50-507. No later than February 1, 2014, the department shall notify the Natural Resources Committee of the Legislature and the Appropriations Committee of the Legislature regarding the projected unexpended and uncommitted balance remaining in the separate budget subprogram.
